entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is mentioned as someone who had to take the test twice.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as someone who is grinning and talking about Charlie.

entities.name: apparation
entities.description: Apparition is a magical event that allows people to travel from one place to another without moving their bodies.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as someone who only passed the test two weeks ago.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as someone who is talking about Percy's passing of the test.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who comes into the kitchen looking pale and drowsy.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who comes into the kitchen with Hermione and asks why they have to be up so early.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is mentioned as someone who explains that they have a bit of a walk.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as someone who talks about Charlie passing the test.

relationships.description: Charlie failed his first apparition attempt, Apparating five miles south of where he meant to.
Percy passed the test two weeks ago and has been Apparating downstairs every morning since.
